fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Publicize a player during the night, during the next day, They must claim  who they will be visiting tonight if possible.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-if they can't visit anyone or dont want to visit; they must claim they are visiting no one tonight
-Whoever they say, they will visit tonight.
-If the target dies in the day they are roleblocked.
-if they dont claim during the day host will figure it out; prob modkill but /shrug
-kill should work in conjunction with things like blackmail; user being afk; day being skipped etc
-but maybe not if the user is just refusing to claim a visit because its the meta thing to do (eg town is using publicizer as a dayvig;which in that case prob pick something else (maybe forcepick?))
